events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of March 31st, involving rear-end collision with another vehicle on Main Street.
Based on the details provided, the claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to collision damage sustained by the insured vehicle.
An agent experienced with auto accident claims has been assigned promptly to handle the case and liaise with the claimant.
Acknowledgement of the claim has been sent to the customer, confirming receipt and outlining the next steps for processing.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle along with the police report and medical bills related to the accident.
Customer provided all requested documents including vehicle damage images and official accident report from the police department.
Investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident has commenced, focusing on fault determination and damage assessment.
Investigation team completed review and confirmed the claimant’s vehicle was damaged due to the collision; fault assigned to the other party.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the customer covering vehicle repair costs and medical expenses resulting from the accident.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the responsiveness and coverage amount.
The claim has been officially approved based on investigation findings and agreement on the settlement amount.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued to the customer’s bank account for repair and medical bills.
The claim case is now closed after successful payment and confirmation from the customer that the repairs and bills were settled.
All documents and files related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
